title: Fully Remodeled | Ideal 1 bedroom apt | Modern kitchen | Large closets
posting_body: Enjoy spacious, well-maintained studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes in a pleasant garden setting in San Jose.
Light-filled rooms, large deck, air conditioning, dishwasher, ceiling fan, lots of closet space, and best of all a really convenient location.

Location — Meridian Apartments are just minutes from charming downtown Willow Glen, downtown San Jose, Valley Medical Center, Valley Fair Shopping Center, the Pruneyard Shopping Center, San Jose City College and close to the San Jose Airport.
The Light Rail station is just 3 blocks away.
Fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances
Convenient Willow Glen area… Ease your commute!
Tours by appointment only, call us today to schedule yours!
Contact us today to schedule a tour!
Photos in ad may not be of actual apartment, however we try our best to use photos similar to the floor plan.

related search terms ::: willow glen, los gatos creek trail, valley medical center, san jose city college, san jose international airport, downtown willow glen, downtown san jose, valley fair shopping center, santana row, hwy 280, hwy 880, hwy 17, hwy 87, public transportation
